title: endai gOvindan
sahitya:
endai gOvindan.  rAgA:  bilahari.  Adi tALA.


1:  endai gOvindan vandAn en perum Anandan vandAn
 nanda kumAran vandAn navanIta cOran vandAn
 caraNam 2    nIrajak-kaNNan vandAn nIlamukhil vaNNan vandAn
 arAvamudan vandAn andamil accutan vandAn
 caraNam 3    kanjan uLLak-kozhuppum en kAl kaigaLin vilangum
 vanjap-pirappum ara vandAn mukundan vandAn
